segments.text: So , are we all ready to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yup , I think so . The car ’ s packed.we have munchies and music , and the map ’ s in the car .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Got it ! Did you fill up the tank ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ re sure we ’ re not forgetting anything ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sure ... we ’ Ve got all our bases covered .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well.let ’ s get going then ! I love road trips !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Um ... do you think we can make a pit stop ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But we ’ Ve only been on the road for ten minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , but I forgot to go to the bathroom before we left .
segments.speaker: S1
